Posts.Content: On Haz 27, 2012 2:04 SMSGNJ wrote: I am 7 months post breast cancer radiation.  Stage 1, lumpectomy, no chemo and now on Arimidex.  i have noticed over the last few months a tenderness in my ribs on the side where I had radiation.  I have read that this could be a side effect of radiation by my Rad Onc says no.  Anybody experience this?  Many thanks! I've experienced a similar symptom after six months after the op. It was more like having bruises on my ribs where I had the op. plus radiation, although nothing was to be seen on the skin. It's gone after a month or so.
Posts.Title: Tender ribs after breast cancer radiation
